put.desc: Create a new activity log alert or update an existing one.

params.name: activityLogAlert
params.desc: The activity log alert to create or use for the update.

200.desc: An existing activity log alert was successfully updated.

201.desc: A new activity log alert was successfully created.

default.desc: An error occurred and the activity log alert could not be created or updated.

get.desc: Get a list of all activity log alerts in a resource group.

default.desc: An error occurred and the list of activity log alerts could not be retrieved.
